headline: US consumers continue to seek value: What recent earnings tell us
summary: Walmart's (WMT) second quarter earnings results show that American consumers are continuing to look for value. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma joins Mind Your Money with Allie Canal to discuss the rise in value-seeking consumer behavior, highlighting recent statements from executives of consumer-facing brands this earnings cycle. Sign up for the Mind Your Money newsletter, and for more information and tools to help you handle your finances, click here. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Mind Your Money.

headline: Lowe’s struggles to fix a concerning customer problem
summary: Lowe's is continuing to battle an alarming consumer trend.

headline: Companies Continue To Soar Under Black Leadership, Just Ask Lowe’s CEO Marvin Ellison
summary: Ellison made history as the first Black executive to serve as CEO of two Fortune 500 companies - joining Lowe’s in 2018 and once working with JCPenney.

raw.headline: Companies Continue To Soar Under Black Leadership, Just Ask Lowe’s CEO Marvin Ellison
raw.summary: Ellison made history as the first Black executive to serve as CEO of two Fortune 500 companies - joining Lowe’s in 2018 and once working with JCPenney.

headline: Billionaire Warren Buffett Sold 41% of Berkshire's Stake in Bank of America and Is Piling Into an Industry Leader That's Gained Almost 47,000% Since Its IPO
summary: This lesser-known stock has been one of the stock market's best performers over the past couple of decades.
